pecan 0.1.0

pecan

Portfolio for Economic Complexity Analysis and Navigation

The goal of pecan is to provide tools for economic complexity analysis and industrial upgrading navigation.

Installation

You can install the development version of pecan from GitHub with:

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("Carol-seven/pecan")
